RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Presidente da Nexus Partners, empresa de consultoria em Gesto Estratgica e Operaes, com experincia em vrias empresas e setores; e Conselheiro independente de trs empresas e Professsor Senior Fellow no Insper em cursos de Ps-Graduao (MBA e MSc) Educao Executiva e Graduao. 

Com mais de 25 anos de experincia em consultoria, Luiz foi Vice-Presidente da Strategy& (ex-Booz & Company), lder da prtica de Operaes, Logstica e Transportes na Amrica Latina, baseado no escritrio de So Paulo (Brasil). Sua experiencia inclui gesto de programas de transformao, desenvolvimento estratgico e reestruturao de negcios, modelo de gesto e operao das empresas em setores como produtos de consumo, varejo e atacado, agronegcio, indstrias de base (incluindo, minerao, ao, automotivo e qumica) e infraestrutura na Amrica Latina. Tambm liderou projetos e programas no setor pblico e para organismos multilaterais, abrangendo reas de planejamento, infraestrutura, regulao e polticas pblicas e fortalecimento institucional.

Alm da consultoria, Luiz acumula experincia como Presidente/CEO da empresa Produzir S.A., joint venture entre Bunge e Dupont em agro-negcio, e professor do Insper (ex-Ibmec So Paulo) nas disciplinas de Estratgia e Operaes nos programas de MBA / MSc, Corporativos e de graduao. membro da Comisso Externa de Avaliao do Insper.

Com PhD em Engenharia, MBA e MSc em Pesquisa Operacional pelo Massachusetts Institute of Technology (USA) e MSc em Transportes pela COPPE/UFRJ (Brasil), Luiz graduado em engenharia civil pela Universidade de Braslia, no Brasil.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Managing Partner of Nexus Partners, consulting company in Strategic and Operations Management, with experience in several companies and sectors; independent Board member of companies -- currently, in 3 companies -- and Professor Senior Fellow at Insper in graduate (MBA and MSc), executive education and undergraduate programs.

With more than 25 years of consulting experience, Luiz was Vice-President / Partner at Strategy& (ex-Booz & Company), leader of Operations, Logistics and Transportation practice in Latin America, based in So Paulo (Brazil). His experience includes transformation programs, strategy development, business restructuring, management model and operations of companies in consumer goods, retail and wholesale, agribusiness and other industry (e.g. mining, steel, automotive and chemicals) and infrastructure sectors in Latin America. He also led projects and programs in the public sector and to multilateral institutions in the planning, infrastructure, regulation and public policies and institutional strengthening.

Beyond consulting, Luiz accumulates experience as the President / CEO of Produzir S.A., joint venture between Bunge and Dupont in agribusiness sector and professor at Insper (ex-Ibmec So Paulo) in Strategy and Operations in MBA / MSc, Executive Education and undegrate courses. He is also member of the External Evaluation Committee.

Luiz holds a PhD in Engineering, MBA and MSc in Operations Research from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (USA), a MSc degree in Transportation Engineering from COPPE/UFRJ (Brazil) and a Civil Engineering bachelor degree form University of Braslia (Brazil)
